en.xbeacon: To light your wing beacon hold X and press RIGHT on the D-pad. Press the LB button once then select beacon and set it from OFF to WING
en.pcwing: To send a wing request, go to the comms panel (Default key 2), hit ESC to get out of the chat box, and move to the second panel (Default key E). Then select the CMDR you want to invite to your wing and select Invite to wing.
en.pcbeacon: To drop a wing beacon, go to the right-side panel (Default key 4), navigate to the functions screen (Default key Q), select BEACON and set it to WING
en.xwing: To add the rats to your wing hold the X button and press up on the D-pad, press RB once, then select the name of a rat and select [Invite to wing]
en.pcfr: To send a friend request, go to the menu (Hit ESC), click friends and private groups, and click ADD FRIEND
en.prep: Please drop from super cruise, come to a complete stop and disable all modules EXCEPT life support
en.xfr: To add the rats to your friends list double-tap the XBOX button, then press LEFT on the D-PAD. Now press A and search for the rat's name.
en.xquit: Please log out of the game immediately by pressing START and selecting Save and Exit to Main Menu!
en.pcquit: Please log out of the game immediately by pressing ESC and selecting Save and Exit to Main Menu!
en.filtergalmap: to learn about Filtering the Galaxy Map click here: http://bit.ly/1GKXCWv
en.kgbfoam: to learn about Filtering the Galaxy Map click here: http://bit.ly/1GKXCWv
en.galnet: Here is a link to Galnet: https://community.elitedangerous.com/galnet
en.sc: Reactivate your thrusters and Frameshift drive, then Un-target everything and jump to supercruise. Fly away from the star for about 5 light seconds, then drop back down into normal space.
en.ratchat: HEY! #fuelrats is for rescue ops only, If you want to chat, Please join #RatChat by typing '/join #RatChat'
en.rc: HEY! #fuelrats is for rescue ops only, If you want to chat, Please join #RatChat by typing '/join #RatChat'
en.prepcr: Please note down your location then Save and Exit to Main Menu immediately!
en.invite: See this short guide on how to accept Wing Invites: http://marenthyu.de/invites.png
en.pcmodules: To power down your modules, please go to your right panel (default key 4), switch to the MODULES tab (default keys e or q), select every Module once and deactivate it. (You can not deactivate your Power Plant and should not deactivate your Life Support!)
en.xmodules: To power down your modules, please go to your right panel (default X + right on the D-pad), switch to the MODULES tab (default key RB), select every Module once and deactivate it. (You can not deactivate your Power Plant and should not deactivate your Life Support!)
